snippet: A mother and father who abducted their eight children from foster care in 2011 have been arrested on charges over allegations of falsely claiming more than $116,000 in public assistance child benefits.
abstract: Shanel Nadal and her husband, John Payne, are arrested on charges that include welfare fraud and grand larceny; couple set off nationwide manhunt after abducting their eight children from Queens, NY, foster care center in 2011; New York City's Investigations Dept says couple, along with Payne's brother Thomas, falsely claimed more than $116,000 in public assistance benefits between 2008 and 2011.
lead_paragraph: A mother and father who abducted their eight children from foster care in 2011 have been arrested on charges over allegations of falsely claiming more than $116,000 in public assistance child benefits.

headline.main: New Woes for 2 Who Abducted Their Children
headline.print_headline: New Woes for 2 Who Abducted Their Children
